result.title: Contest Formats
result.content:
Hi all,

I would like to share the formats of the regular contests in this group.

Details

There will be FOUR contests each week.

Friday Contest (CodeForces Hard Round) will be brought to you by HidenoriS. It will consists of 10 problems drawn from CF Div. 2 D+E problems.

Saturday Contest (CodeForces Easy Round I) will be brought to you by yongwhan. It will consists of 26 problems drawn from Div. 2 A+B+C problems.

Sunday Contest (Online Judge Round) will be brought to you by yongwhan. It will consists of 10 problems drawn from Timus OJ.

Monday Contest (CodeForces Easy Round II) will be brought to you by yongwhan. It will consists of 26 problems drawn from CF Div. 2 A+B+C problems.

We expect that the contest difficulty would be Friday ~ Sunday >> Saturday ~ Monday.

If you follow through all the contests, you should be well on your way to becoming a red coder in TopCoder and CodeForces towards the end of the year, or even earlier. It is imperative that you are NOT looking at editorial/solution until the contest is finished â€” if you do not follow this rule, you may not improve as much as you wish.

We will be providing you with the link to the editorial so that you can upsolve them. Remember that upsolving a problem is as crucial (if not more) as participating in the contests.

Note

If you do not feel challenged enough by those, please let us know. We will be adjusting the difficulty as we go.

(Much) more to come later!

Wish you a high rating,

yongwhan

P.S. If you would like to organize a contest, you are more than welcome to do so. The only rule is that, if you want to make it regular, please let yongwhan know so that the contest could become the part of a permanent schedule.
